content: *this cute chicken purse is perfect for stashing your change yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds * main color mc jute 00082 *1 ball* * contrast a warm brown 01130 *1 ball* * country red 01530 *small quantity* * hot orange 01628 *small quantity* *additional materials * * 2 stitch markers * 6 15 cm zipper * 2 glue-on googly eyes * glue ---
